changeSet.author: hparry
changeSet.sql:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW readable.resource_relationship_attribute AS SELECT rp.id, r.name AS resource, rel.name AS relationship, a.name AS attribute, rp.notes, res.name AS research, up.name AS updated_by, rp.update_date FROM ruleform.resource_authorization rp JOIN ruleform.resource r ON rp.resource = r.id JOIN ruleform.relationship rel ON rp.relationship = rel.id JOIN ruleform.attribute a ON rp.attribute = a.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.research res ON rp.research = res.id JOIN ruleform.resource up ON rp.updated_by = up.id;
ALTER TABLE readable.resource_relationship_attribute OWNER TO core;
